title: nIyE sharaN
sahitya:
nIyE sharaN SaNmukhA karuNai nidhi nI aruLvAi anaghA ninnaDimaikku


anupallavi

  shEi yAriDamum shellumO Inra tAyallAl tirumAl maruganE vadivEl muruganE


caraNam    svAminAtha mAmayUravAhA shankara gauri kumAra vishAkA
rAmadAsan paNiyum guhA sura rAja pUjita padAm puruhA aiyA
